name: Kings And Pigs Haskell
description:
You, the human king, want to get through the castle!  Unfortunately, there are some filthy peasant pigs and king pigs on your way... You know what to do... KILL... THEM... ALL... Or don't, whatever. As long as you get through the castle!

A platformer game made in the functional programming language Haskell, using Gloss. It was created for a school project. 

Assets modified from Pixel Frog's Kings and Pigs Asset Pack (https://pixelfrog-assets.itch.io/kings-and-pigs).
